title: Women taking part in elections and working in mixed environment - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: Almer says can women take part in elections for ministerial posts or should they just be in administration women are not allowed at all to be elected for ministerial posts or for government positions where they will be mixing with men a Muslim woman is not allowed to mix with men because again this is part of our values what type of religion is this when a woman mixes with other men in the free talk and they have business lunches and dinners and Allah knows what happens afterwards what kind of religion is this no definitely this is totally out of the question for a Muslim movement of course if she is not Muslim she shouldn't be asking this question
